snippet: After years of proud independence, some companies are joining forces, powered by an app, to create a car service network in hopes of fighting expanding ride-hailing companies.
abstract: More car services in New York City are providing customers with a smartphone app designed by Limosys Software, banding together to form network to compete with popular Uber service, whose impact on neighborhood car services has largely been overlooked; one advantage local services have over Uber is their willingness to accept cash as payment.
lead_paragraph: After years of proud independence, some companies are joining forces, powered by an app, to create a car service network in hopes of fighting expanding ride-hailing companies.

headline.main: Neighborhood Car Service Companies Adopt Their Own Apps to Fend Off Uber
headline.print_headline: Car Service Companies Adopt Their Own Apps to Fend Off Uber
